activities: 2sms runs text messaging services for business customers. Customers upload contact information to us, in addition to personal information we store on their behalf to allow us to identify them. Finally, we store details of the SMS communications they use on our systems.
address: Crestview Tower, 105 Decker Court, Suite LL110
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We are a licensee of the TRUSTe Privacy seal
recoursemech: Customers can complain using the TRUSTe process.
